description: Manages a V2 function resource within HuaweiCloud.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

CodeFilename.description:
Name of a function file, This field is mandatory only when coe_type is
set to jar or zip. Changing this creates a new function.

CodeType.description:
Function code type, which can be inline: inline code, zip: ZIP file,
jar: JAR file or java functions, obs: function code stored in an OBS bucket. Changing this
creates a new function.

CodeUrl.description:
This parameter is mandatory when code_type is set to obs. Changing this
creates a new function.

Description.description: Description of the function. Changing this creates a new function.

FuncCode.description:
Function code. When code_type is set to inline, zip, or jar, this parameter is mandatory,
and the code must be encoded using Base64. Changing this creates a new function.

Handler.description: Entry point of the function. Changing this creates a new function.

MemorySize.description: Memory size(MB) allocated to the function. Changing this creates a new function.

Name.description: A unique name for the function. Changing this creates a new function.

Package.description: Group to which the function belongs. Changing this creates a new function.

Runtime.description: Environment for executing the function. Changing this creates a new function.

Timeout.description: Timeout interval of the function, ranges from 3s to 900s. Changing this creates a new function.

UserData.description: Key/Value information defined for the function. Changing this creates a new function.

Xrole.description:
This parameter is mandatory if the function needs to access other cloud services.
Changing this creates a new function.
